rankInBanner.description: When enabled, the performer's Glicko rank is displayed in place of their Stash rating.

rankInCardFooter.description: When enabled, the performer's Glicko rank is displayed in their card footer.

rankInImage.description: When enabled, the performer's Glicko rank is displayed in the bottom-left corner of their card image.

rankOnPage.description: When enabled, the performer's Glicko rank is displayed next to their Stash rating on their profile page.

ratingOnPage.description: When enabled, the performer's Glicko rating is displayed next to their Stash rating on their profile page.

ratingNotRank.description: When enabled, the performer's Glicko rating is displayed in place of their rank in the Stash performer cards.
